channel.title: Denis Kyashif's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Denis Kyashif's Blog

item.title: Implementing a Text Rewriter
item.description: An algorithm for constructing a linear-time text rewriter using the leftmost-longest match replacement strategy.

item.title: Resolving Ambiguity in Text Rewriting
item.description: Strategies for resolving conflicts that occur when two replacement substrings overlap.

item.title: Finite-State Transducers for Text Rewriting
item.description: An overview from a set-theoretic perspective and constructions for powerful, linear-time text rewriting.

item.title: C# Channels - Async Data Pipelines
item.description: How to implement an assembly line concurrency model in .NET using channels.

item.title: C# Channels - Timeout and Cancellation
item.description: Explore cancellation and timeout techniques with channels.

item.title: C# Channels - Publish / Subscribe Workflows
item.description: Concurrency patterns in .NET using channels.

item.title: A Practical Guide to State Machines
item.description: Express application logic in a concise and declarative way using state machines and C#‘s pattern matching.

item.title: Translation using Syntactic Rules
item.description: How to describe a formal language and build a translator with ANTLR and JavaScript.

item.title: Computing Ranges in Constant Time
item.description: Range Minimum Query with Sparse Table and Dynamic Programming.

item.title: Gödel's System T in TypeScript
item.description: Experimenting with a rudimentary type system that ensures the programs always terminate.

item.title: On Recursive Functions
item.description: The Y combinator or how to implement recursion in a language that doesn’t support it.

item.title: Implementing a Regular Expression Engine
item.description: Using Ken Thompson’s construction algorithm.

item.title: Scalable Angular Apps at DevReach 2018
item.description: DevReach is one of the largest tech conferences in Eastern Europe, focused on .NET and JavaScript. I had the pleasure to attend as a speaker, talking about Scalable Angular Applications.

item.title: Setting Up a Project With Telerik UI for ASP.NET MVC
item.description: This is a step by step guide on how to setup a project from scratch with the Telerik UI for ASP.NET MVC component suite or integrate it to an existing one.

item.title: Impressions from EMEA Pug Challenge 2017
item.description: I had the pleasure to speak at the annual EMEA PUG Challenge conference in Prague. This is my second visit to this event. I was very excited about it because I already had fond memories of the last year’s one in the Netherlands.

item.title: KendoUI TreeList Load on Demand
item.description: How to lazily load the descendant items of a record in a TreeList.

item.title: Statistical Machine Translation on Azure VM using Moses
item.description: Training a machine translation model on an Azure compute optimized VM.

item.title: Impressions from EMEA PUG Challenge 2016
item.description: I had the pleasure to speak at the annual EMEA PUG Challenge conference. I’ve been eagerly anticipating the event and as now it’s over, let me share my impressions with you.

item.title: Validate any DOM element with the KendoUI validator
item.description: Not only inputs.

item.title: Bring .NET Development into your favourite editor with Omnisharp
item.description: IntelliSense as a service.
